.. _Installation:

============
Installation
============

From PyPI
~~~~~~~~~

inspectomop can be installed via pip from
`PyPI <https://pypi.org/project/inspectomop>`__.

.. code-block:: bash

   $ pip install inspectomop

From Source
~~~~~~~~~~~

1. Download the `inspectomop project <https://github.com/jbadger3/inspectomop>`__ from GitHub.

2. From the root directory of inspectomop run::

    python setup.py install

Dependencies
~~~~~~~~~~~~
* `python <https://www.python.org/downloads/>`__: version 3.0 or higher
* `sqlalchemy <https://www.sqlalchemy.org>`__: version 2.0 or higher
* `pandas <https://pandas.pydata.org>`__: version 0.22.0 or higher
